title: AlternativeTo Scraper
description: Scrape AI tools and alternatives from AlternativeTo.net. Provide either a search keyword OR an AlternativeTo search/category URL (startUrl, url, or startUrls). Actor paginates and optionally scrapes detail pages.

startUrls.title: Start URLs (list)
startUrls.description: List of AlternativeTo URLs to start from. If provided, overrides Keyword.

keyword.title: Search Keyword (if not using Start URL)
keyword.description: Search keyword on AlternativeTo. Examples: 'DALL-E', 'Midjourney', 'AI image generator'.

collectDetails.title: Collect tool details
collectDetails.description: If enabled, scraper opens tool detail pages for full description and additional info.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of tools
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of tools to collect. Leave empty to collect all available tools.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: A safety cap on the number of search result pages to visit.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy for best results.
